MAPIMG(6D)                                           MAPIMG(6D)





NAME
       mapimg - translates a screen image into an RGB image

SYNOPSIS
       mapimg image.sc image.rgb temp.map

DESCRIPTION
       mapimg  translates  a screen image into a full RGB image
       using the given color map. The color map is usually gen-
       erated by savemap.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                MAPIMG(6D)
